column5: Anyone care to share some pictures of there aluminium boats they have converted or changed the layout? I am curious of the pics as to help me out in the layout of my project   Nelson
Not sure what the best search words are Nelson..but I think just about everyone that has done a reno has posted it here and you should be able to dig the threads up.
Keram did one of the best reno jobs IMHO Do a search of his post

Thanks guys :-) I have done tons of searching with no real indepth articles so to speak, I tried doing a search on here various ways with no success as to finding the post by Karem :-( If anyone knows where it is :-) Hometownhandyman I have seen that one and its not to bad and gave me a few insights :-)  Nelson
Go to Keram's profile and it will bring up his posts.
